sayfalar:
My Day at Home

Hello! My name is Ali. Today, I am in my house. My mother and father are in the garden.

My friend wants to come to my home. We sit in the kitchen. We eat a red apple and we drink cold water.

I have a big dog and a small cat. The cat likes to sleep on the sofa.

I read a blue book. Then, we go to the park in my car.
